text: I love shopping at Chico ‘s in the Parkway Place Mall.  The sales staff is wonderful.  They are very helpful in making the greatest recommendation.  If they don’t  have the item I’m looking for they will help locate the item for me.  Great customer service!

I love this place,the clothes fit me perfectly and the clerks are nice
It is a great store

text: I have always loved this store and bought tons of clothes here. I was very disappointed in one of their employees last week. She did not want to accommodate my elderly Mom by getting her a chair to sit in.  Very disappointed customer!!

text: Friendly, helpstaff. Great selection and ordered what I wanted that they didn't have in stock. Will be shipped to my home without paying shipping

name: Linda Maloy
text: My favorite store since it first came to Biimgham many, many, many moons ago!  Why, I have clothes from there purchased over 20 years ago that still look great!  You simply cannot beat well made, hip, classic clothes from Chico's! (No, hip, classic is NOT an oxymoron.)

name: Adriana Morros
text: Best customer care I’ve ever had!!!  They help me, elderly women and women with disabilities.  They are the best store at the summit with the best sales women.  I’ve personally witnessed them take white glove care of women in wheel chairs and a visually impaired woman.  The one sales woman met the visually impaired woman , ,who needed a cane, at the front door and walked her to the items she wanted to try and then walk her to the dressing room.  Because of their salesmanship and care of ALL customers, they get my vote for best business at the Summit and in Vestavia/BIRMINGHAM.

name: Leisa Lee
text: Love Chico's but customer service at the location does not exist at this location! They need Chad here!

Chicos....always perfect!

name: Sara Hardin
text: Love this store! Just wished they had larger sizes.. It seems like stores would realize they can't keep larger sizes in stock, they sell out immediately and the little kids sizes are always the ones that don't get sold!!

name: Sheila Mac10
text: Is this A Simply Obsessed Store like Sarah Gibbon's?

name: Tipawan Gallo
text: The store is nice and everything is stocked nicely and very neat. The styles are decent but unfortunately they do not carry XS. The clothing isn’t made for short, petite folks like myself. :(

name: Baylee Fuqua
text: I normally always pick dress up to shop in its close to my house and it’s somewhere me and my daughter both love. We have always had a wonderful experience but today not so much. Today my daughter and her friend decided we’d do some shopping and eating while they had their “big girl” lunch together I walked two stores down to dress up and decided I’d look for her a cute dress while they had their time together to chat! Found the cutest two dresses and proceeded to the check to ask if I could leave them there for ten mins while I walk literally two stores down. I’ve done this time and time before we always eat at the local restaurant connected to the strip mall. I was quickly told NO sorry we can’t hold anything. I was a little shocked and explained she was two doors down and I wanted to make sure they were a good fit due to them being final sale. The two looked at each other and said sorry because you can go online 24 hours and order we aren’t allowed to hold anything. Now if I’d previously not held something before maybe I’d believe them. One proceeded to say I’ll put it in the fitting room and we can just say she’s waiting on the fitting room!! Which means YOUR HOLDING IT. I smiled and told them that was ok and walked out needless to say I will only order from online or if I see the manager ( can’t remeber her name but she’s awesome) I’ll only shop then. These two youngsters possible need a lesson on customer service!!!

name: A M
text: Women working there were very helpful and I found some super cute unique items yesterday. I have been twice before and I try to occasionally stop by to see what might be in season. Prices are very affordable too for a more boutique style business. It is also where I get a lot of my crop tops, which can be hard to find in other stores here.

name: Cindy Kelley
text: Beautiful clothes,  great prices,  excellent customer service!

name: Jamie Householder
text: My wife's favorite boutique in Huntsville. New stuff every time we go, prices are reasonable, and you can even find markdowns and sales.

name: Nikki Nicole
text: I just went into this location to get a cocktail dress and  Brittany found the perfect dress for me and Erica was so pleasant. I would recommend this store to anyone looking for excellent customer service and affordable clothing.

name: Kristie Harris
text: Needs more salespeople. Can be hard to find parking . This store caters for teens.

resp.text:
Hi Kristie!💕
We would love to see you again soon! We get new arrivals every single Monday so there is something for everyone! If you don't see any available parking spots in front of the store we do have a parking garage that typically has many open spots!! I hope that helps!!

name: Pree Daytona
text: We stopped to buy bread on the way to DeSoto State park. I wanted to buy a dress to take some pictures. I just googled and this nice place appeared with good reviews. I added a stop to Factory Connections and bought 3 dresses instead of one. So pretty! So worth! Staff was so nice. I highly recommend this place.

name: Elizabeth Kennedy
text: Friendly helpful staff and always a great selection for all my families clothing and accessory needs under one roof! Great selection and great prices ! A NO-HASSLE and upbeat retail experience Everytime !

text: Its better in person than the website is

name: Gretchen Perry
text: I love Torrid. As a plus size woman I feel like I cant go into most places and find sexy trendy  etc clothes but Torrid always delivers. If anything I wish they carried a few more of the bigger sizes in the stores but I know I can usually find it online if not in store!

name: Megan Cook
text: Went in at 6:20. Had a handful of items picked out by 6:30. Just needed to try on and pay. Employee told me their changing rooms were closed because they were preparing to close, despite having just let another lady into a room. Their store does not close until 7:00. I was in town for work and needed a couple things for the week. I do not buy clothes without trying them on. Left without purchasing them. Will not be back to this location.

name: Cornesia Lewis
text: I want to start by saying the only reason I give it 4 stars is because the staff wasn’t welcoming at the time, love the clothes but it made me want to shop else where because of how the staff was. When I went to try on stuff, which I was iffy about (covid-19), but I have to try on certain stuff. At first i was the only one in the store for a little while before a second person came in, I asked about the dressing room, girl went in to clean it sanitize which I appreciate. But if I’m about to buy something & I’m trying it on why is the staff asking how long I got in the dressing room she knocked on door more than once , like was there a time limit or something? she kept asking me other people need to try on stuff I’m thinking like it’s about 4 other rooms & then they told me once I go in I can’t go in but once.  With that being said I made sure that I took in all what I could & wanted to purchase. Like don’t rush I’m trying multiple pieces, come out it’s like one person with two other people sitting including a man, which he is not trying on stuff waiting. Manager kept making small comments to staff hardly spoke when I came in....I wanted to give them a piece of my mind but wasn’t worth my time,  hence store was only open about 45 mins when I arrived so I don’t want to hear anything about a long day. Would have never went into store but shop online but I needed something I didn’t want to wait To ship only to arrive with limited selection. The world is already in a crisis to have people like this   Someone would love to have your job & customers are what keeping it open.

name: gwendolyn johnson
text: Great staff, great sale today

name: 100 Real
text: First time shopping there . I wasn't greeted and noone offered assistance

name: Alexandria Gauntt
text: Very nice and has some lovely clothes. The dressing rooms are designed nicely also.

text: First let me say that I Love Torrid. Their clothes are awesome and the fit is even better. However, I do get frustrated with the local Torrid store, because they never have anything in stock. I'm not just talking about the online exclusive things. They always say how they don't have something.  Other than that,  Torrid is awesome

text: I was pleasantly surprised by all the pretty clothes. I have nerve problems in my shoulders and finally found a pretty bra that is comfortable and doesn't cause pain. I will be going back.

name: Faye Golden
text: Needed something for a job interview (gained weight). A DIFFERENT retail store I was in treats customers like everyone steals. So I left them and walked into WHBM. The sales team asked could they help. I said," I'm looking for an excellent customer service experience." And that is what I got. They pulled a chair so my mom could see my options without me having to walk back and forth for every change. Found tons of nice items but not THE outfit, until ANOTHER team member said someone just returned an online order unopened and in your size. It might work. She was looking out even though I wasn't her customer and she was right. Brought the suit and a new wardrobe.

name: Jessica McMillian
text: Cute clothes. Infact I have several pieces of clothing from White House Black Market. But when I walked into this store I was greeted with the most unwelcoming and awkward experience. My friend agreed. Explains why there were no other customers in the store. Tip for employees, if you ask if I need help and I say "no thank you Im just looking!" That doesnt mean roll your eyes and make a face. If the reception were nicer maybe you'd have more customers. I'll be going to the Birmingham store instead. Two stars for the fact they had cute clothes.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing what an awesome experience you had with the team at the Bel Air Mall EXPRESS. We forwarded your feedback to the District Manager so that they know what a special time you all had in the store. If you should have any additional questions, feel free to reach us at 1-888-397-1980.

name: A1aerials Droner
text: Great place for competitive paying jobs.

name: Dani Cakes
text:
My son, who is kind of shy, had a school dance coming up so we were in need of a suit. We didn’t know where to start and neither my son nor I had any confidence in what to even look at.
When we walked in, Malcolm headed straight for us and instantly took us under his wing. He patiently spent close to an hour helping my son find the right fit, the right color (for his skin tone) and to match his date’s dress. We found everything we needed except for the tie. We were so very pleased with the purchase we made. But the most important thing we left with, was my son’s confidence! Malcolm told my son “to stand up straight, lift your head up, and be confident in the good looking guy that he is”
As a mom, to a shy teenage boy,  this means the world to me!
When we left to go find the tie at a different store, we were totally lost again. My son said “mom, do you think we can go get Malcolm to help us?” They may not ever see each other again but this guy with the exceptional customer service skills made a LIFELONG impact on my son. Express, I hope you realize how great of an employee you have in Malcolm. I wish the world was filled with more Malcolms.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing what an awesome experience you had with the team at the Bel Air Mall EXPRESS. We forwarded your feedback to the District Manager so that they know what a special time you all had in the store. If you should have any additional questions, feel free to reach us at 1-888-397-1980.

name: josie
text: no one greeted me or smiled or anything and one shirt is like 89 dollars I got scared and left

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your feedback with us. Your comments have been shared with the District Manager. If there is anything else that we can do for you, please feel free to call us at 1-888-397-1980 and select option 3 or email us at talk@express.com.

name: Nicole Duncan

This is not the place I want to give my money too.

name: Maria Hayes
text:
I've been hearing so much about how comfortable the masks are at Old Navy. Today they were on sale online. $7.50 for a five pack. I got two packs. They text me when my order was ready and then brought it to my at curbside.
I hate to shop so this was perfect for me. Great experience.

name: Becky Duckett
text: Old Navy=BAD NEWS.  BIG red signs on doors and windows say "50% Off Everything", so I decided to purchase overpriced face masks.  I got to the counter with 2 packages and found out that "masks are excluded".  Although not happy, I decided to go ahead and purchase for the sake of supporting local retailers.  Within 5 minutes, I discovered that the masks are only one layer of fabric, so I went back to return them. After waiting in line, I was told "masks are not returnable".  I suggested that they check the time on the receipt since I couldn't have worn them, but they just pointed to a very small sign near the checkout that said masks were not returnable.  So... a huge bait and switch sale sign, a tiny disclaimer sign, and I am stuck with $25 of worthless little pieces of cloth.  Bad business practices, Old Navy. What good does it do to make a sale that gains you a disgruntled customer?  Old Navy will never get my business again, and I will encourage my friends to stay away, too.

name: Frances Hatmaker
text: Clean.  Could use more low rise jeans

name: Maryann Brady
text: I can always find something at old navy customer service was great

name: Mark Hall
text:
There are some great kids at this store. Got help finding my son some winter clothes and the wait wasn't bad.
The poor score goes to who I assume to be the manager. She yelled at a cashier from behind the line and then started pointing her finger and rolling her eyes. She looked like she was in a bad way, but there's a way to conduct yourself and that was not it. I'm sure the holidays are rough in retail, but everyone deserves respect.

text: Great prices and very friendly employees Edit: I’m also very happy that they provide curbside service now. It makes things a lot easier now. Thanks Old Navy

I'm sure they will be happy to know we won't be back

name: Gavin Fox
text: Old Navy had everything I was looking for and the service was really nice. The employees were really nice and helpful so I really recommend this place to anybody who needs to buy clothes for babys, kids, and adult clothes.

name: Maya Crosby
text: After my horrible experience at the Old Navy in Oxford, I traveled over an hour and half to go to this Old Navy. Let me just say what a 180! The store manager herself was out on the floor working. Stopped to asked me if she could help, and spoke to my 5 yr old daughter. Continued through the store it was very neat and tidy. I got asked if I needed help(in a friendly manner) by every associate I passed.  I even had a the manager tell me to come back if I could, and she would help me personally shop for certain looks! I have  officially boycotted the Oxford store. The treatment I received at this store is definitely worth the drive. I beyond highly recommend this Old Navy. I will be back!!!

name: Crystal Meeks
text: They had a really good sale & alot of great items that were clearance.

text: It's a wonderful place to shop. Good prices. A wide selection for the family.

name: Judson Powell
text: Had a bad experience at another store that gave my wife a bad store credit. The gentleman who was the manager took time to find out what the problem was, and assured my wife he would take care of it. It was after their closing time when my wife left. She said he didn't have to stay open for her but he did. Super experience. Some of these other stores should take notes cause that extra effort just earned our business.

name: Sawyer Aiko
text: My place to go to relieve stress!  I took my mom  who is a fan of Chico's and boy did she go crazy!  Sales person is very attentive and seeing my mother with armful of clothes, she immediately prepared her with a dressing room.  I love this store and cant wait to go back again.

name: Nelda Faulkner
text: My favorite place to shop!!  Great sale in progress!  The sales clerks are so helpful and polite....missed Johnnie,  but the others are doing a great job!  I don't think you will be disappointed!!

name: Phil James
text: Very disappointed in the customer service. Prices were good but the sales clerks never spoke to us. I watched while my wife was looking at clothing.  She was wearing shorts and a tee-shirt because it's easier to try on clothes. She was completely ignored. The salespeople greeted and engaged in conversation every lady who was dressed up or seemed to be known to them to help them find things. My wife was looking for a particular item and they were no help. Even after my wife approached one of the sales clerks she didn't offer to help. They even ignored an elderly lady in a wheelchair. As an old retail manager, I found that level of elitism appalling. So the moral of the story is, if you don't care if salespeople are rude, this is the place for you. But if you need help finding something or you want to be treated courteously, then stay away from this place.
